description:
Rainer Blumhardt was a former http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Imperial] citizen of common birth, who after moving to the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance] joined up with the http://anidb.net/ch6224 [Rosen Ritter].
A skilled soldier, Blumhardt participated in the infiltration of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] during the Seventh Battle of Iserlohn. He was later killed in 800 UC while escorting Admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] to negotiations with http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm], when a group of Terraists boarded their cruiser.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Rainer Blumhardt
